wordpressPost.title: Letton Hall Talk Notes – Discipleship
wordpressPost.content:
Last week I spent 4 days at Letton Hall in Norfolk with The CROPS Trust for their Letton Hall House Party.

I’ve been going to Letton on and off since I was 14 either with my parents church or with CROPS and it was great to be back for the 1st time in 4 years.

I had been asked to speak on discipleship with the theme ‘The D-Factor’ and it was a real privilege to spend the week with some awesome young people and (hopefully) get them thinking more about discipleship and the life of discipleship that Jesus calls us to.

When I write talks I tend to script them out and then paraphrase myself as I go along and so my notes are pretty comprehensive so I thought I’d put them online for people to look at if their interested (links below).

Also check out The CROPS Trust and the great work they do with schools and churches in Peterborough.

Talk 1 – Who Do You Follow?
Talk 2 – Jesus is Lord
Talk 3 – The Journey
Talk 4 – ‘Go & Make Disciples’
